Subject: URL blacklist not working
Description:
Hi Team,
I added a URL to the domain block list and added it to my prod policy and for some reason I am still able to reach it via my browser.
What_We_Know__c: The customer enabled DPI but the DPI certificate was not imported on the macs.
Next_Steps__c:
We had a remote session where we imported the DPI certificate and marked it as trusted on one machine. This addressed the issue.
The deployment guide was sent to the customer in order to deploy the DPI certificate to all the machines.
